ValidateThis.extras
Class ValidateThisCBPlugin

WEB-INF.cftags.component
        coldbox.system.frameworkSupertype
            coldbox.system.plugin
                ValidateThis.extras.ValidateThisCBPlugin

public class ValidateThisCBPlugin

extends coldbox.system.plugin

I am a plugin that allows ValidateThis to be accessed easily from within Coldbox.
